welcome.firstTime: First time? Run setup to get started!
welcome.typeMessage: Type a command or 'help' to see available commands

messages.renderError: Prompt couldn't be rendered in the current environment

add.selectFiles: Choose files to stage for commit (Space to select, Enter to confirm)
add.noFilesSelected: No files were staged. Your working directory remains unchanged.
add.nextStep: **Next step:** Run `/commit` to create your commit, or continue staging more files.

commit.useAddFirst: Use /add to stage files first, or try /squawk to commit files individually.

squawk.title: Committing files individually...
squawk.noChanges: No files with changes to commit.

setup.intro: Let's get you set up. This will only take a minute.

commitConventions.conventionalDesc: feat:, fix:, docs: - Standard semantic commits

setup.customCommitHelp: Describe your commit format. Use placeholders like {type}, {scope}, {message}
setup.customCommitExample:
Example:
[{type}] {message}

Where {type} can be: feature, bugfix, refactor
{message} is the commit description
setup.customCommitRequired: Custom commit format cannot be empty

branchNaming.gitflowDesc: feature/, bugfix/, hotfix/, release/ - Standard git-flow
branchNaming.customDesc: Define your own branch naming pattern

setup.customBranchHelp: Describe your branch format. Use placeholders like {type}, {ticket}, {description}
setup.customBranchExample:
Example:
{username}/{type}/{description}

Where {username} is your git username
{type} can be: feature, fix, chore
{description} is a short description
setup.customBranchRequired: Custom branch format cannot be empty
setup.followProjectPatterns: Follow existing project patterns for commits and branches?
setup.followProjectPatternsHelp: Analyze recent commits and branches to maintain consistency
setup.selectAnalyzeDepth: How many recent items should be analyzed?

analyzeDepth.last10Desc: Quick analysis - Fast but less context
analyzeDepth.last25Desc: Balanced - Good patterns with reasonable speed

setup.selectCodeReviewStyle: How detailed should code reviews be?

codeReviewStyles.detailedDesc: In-depth analysis with suggestions and examples
codeReviewStyles.conciseDesc: Brief, focused feedback on key issues
codeReviewStyles.securityDesc: Emphasis on security vulnerabilities and best practices

setup.selectPRStyle: Choose your pull request message style:

prStyles.detailedDesc: Comprehensive description with context and test plan

setup.wantsCustomInstructions: Would you like to add custom instructions?
setup.customInstructionsHelp: Examples: 'Always include emojis', 'Keep messages under 50 chars', 'Focus on performance'
setup.customInstructionsEditor: Your default editor will open for multi-line input
setup.customInstructionsExample:
# Custom Instructions

- Always include emojis in commit messages
- Keep messages concise (under 50 characters)
- Focus on performance improvements
- Add context about why changes were made
setup.testSuccess: Connection successful! Your setup is working.
setup.retrySetup: Would you like to try again?
